name: Lars (itch)
description:
Lars is a short, depressive text adventure about dealing with the horrors of the human mind and the situation at hand.

For fans of Lovecraft, text adventures, Stephen King, retro horror, and Silent Hill. Contains depressing themes and music.

**WebGL users:

-build uploaded 12.27.17_May be unstable in certain browsers

-doesn't work well full screen, recommend download if you want to play full screen

-Recommend not touching the settings/quit button

Current Ver. - 8.4.17 _Alpha04

-Settings menu added, music on/off, full screen/windowed (alt+enter also works)

-Mac/Linux build posted, untested (still not sure about .zip files?)

-Soundtrack posted for free download https://anotherroutineemergency.bandcamp.com/album/lars-ost

Estimated playtime: 10-25 minutes

My first published game made for Made for MyFirstGameJam2017

Maybe more updates to come, probably done with this for awhile.

Continually open to suggestions and criticisms, please let me know what you think, especially what you don't like!
